Articles.Content:
I have just gotten back into KSP after a month long Break, so I built some new ships. Here is the first one, which is an anlouge for the Orion Next-gen spacecraft, with an SLS launch system.

Pictures

On the launch pad

SRB Sepped

Stage Sep, launch tower jettisoned

In orbit

NOTES:

There is a fair amount of wobble on the launch, but this is neither here nor there, it is harmless.

There is something borked about the sepatrons on the second stage, which I'm unsure of what is wrong.

The actual Orion craft is a bit OP on the Torque front, so fine control is a must.

Craft is here: https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B13W1Qcyhbc5TDBDeGJyQTdhb0k/edit?usp=sharing

Edited June 21, 2013 by llamatoes
Wrong URL
